titleStmt.title: [Rock the cradle John, or,] Children after the rate of 24 in a yeare thats 2 euery month as plaine doth appeare, Let no man at this strang [sic] story wonder. It goes to the tune of Ouer and under.
titleStmt.author: L. P. (Laurence Price), fl. 1625-1680?

titleStmt.title: [Rock the cradle John, or,] Children after the rate of 24 in a yeare thats 2 euery month as plaine doth appeare, Let no man at this strang [sic] story wonder. It goes to the tune of Ouer and under.
titleStmt.author: L. P. (Laurence Price), fl. 1625-1680?

notesStmt.note: Signed at end of second part: Finis. Lau. Price.
Right half-sheet contains: The second part. To the same tune.
Imperfect: cropped, with loss of title (supplied from STC 2nd ed.), stained.
Reproduction of original in: Pepys Library.
